sentences.en: a barbed wire fence
sentences.cn: 带刺铁丝网围栏

sentences.en: a telephone wire
sentences.cn: 电话线

sentences.en: a wire fence
sentences.cn: 铁丝网

sentences.en: acrobatics on the high wire
sentences.cn: 走钢丝杂技

sentences.en: By night, the perimeter wire was illumined by lights.
sentences.cn: 到了夜里，周遭的铁丝网都被灯光照亮。

sentences.en: copper wire
sentences.cn: 铜丝

sentences.en: He got a wire to go home.
sentences.cn: 他接到一封让他回家的电报。

sentences.en: He then soldered the wire to the telephone terminal.
sentences.cn: 接着他把电话线焊接到电话机上。

sentences.en: He was helping wire up the Channel Tunnel last season.
sentences.cn: 他上一季在协助英吉利海峡隧道的电缆铺设工作.

sentences.en: I ripped out the telephone wire that ran through to his office.
sentences.cn: 我把通到他办公室的电话线拔掉了。

sentences.en: If I get another tummy ache, I will wire you to come.
sentences.cn: 如果我再肚子疼,我会发电报让你来.

sentences.en: it was probable that the test of nerves would go down to the wire.
sentences.cn: 有可能神经检查是最后一项。

sentences.en: it was probable that the test of nerves would go down to the wire.
sentences.cn: 有可能神经检查是最后一项。

sentences.en: Negotiators again worked right down to the wire to reach an agreement.
sentences.cn: 谈判人员又是直到最后时刻才达成了协议。

sentences.en: Please wire me when you arrive.
sentences.cn: 你到达后请打电报给我。

sentences.en: She learned to wire and plumb the house herself.
sentences.cn: 她学会了自己给房子拉接电线、敷设水管。

sentences.en: The camp is surrounded by razor-wire fences and guarded by military police.
sentences.cn: 营地周围架着尖利的铁丝网，且有宪兵看守。

sentences.en: The factory was surrounded by barbed wire.
sentences.cn: 工厂用带刺的铁丝网围着。

sentences.en: The surrounding land was enclosed by an eight foot wire fence.
sentences.cn: 周围的土地围有8英尺高的铁丝栅栏。

sentences.en: The wire snapped at the wall plug and the light fused.
sentences.cn: 墙上插座的电线短路烧断了保险丝，电灯跟着灭了。

sentences.en: There may even be some wire or nylon biting into the flesh.
sentences.cn: 甚至可能有一些金属丝或者尼龙线勒到肉里。

sentences.en: Turn the cake the right way up on to a wire rack.
sentences.cn: 把蛋糕翻到合适的方向对准金属丝架上。

phrases.phrase: down to the wire【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 坚持到最后：如赛跑或比赛中到最后一刻，最终
n. [美俚]好消息；（不用钥匙起动点火装置的）短路点火；带电电线
生龙活虎的人；通电的电线
【非正式用语】 及时；在最后一刻
电火花线切割；钢丝切坯
线材；盘条；盘圆；钢丝筋条
(北美，非正式)从起点到终点；自始至终

trans.tran_en: thin metal in the form of a thread, or a piece of this
